mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM clue where cl_type_id=#{clTypeId} AND cl_invalid = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO clue(cl_c_id, cl_project, cl_place_time, cl_earnest, cl_earnest_detail, cl_u_id, cl_source, cl_remark, cl_message, cl_type_id, cl_invalid) VALUES (#{clCId}, #{clProject}, #{clPlaceTime}, #{clEarnest}, #{clEarnestDetail}, #{clUId}, #{clSource}, #{clRemark}, #{clMessage}, #{clTypeId}, 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE clue SET cl_type_id = #{clTypeId} WHERE cl_id = #{clId}
UPDATE clue SET cl_invalid = 1 WHERE cl_id = #{clId}
UPDATE clue SET cl_earnest = #{clEarnest}, cl_earnest_detail = #{clEarnestDetail} WHERE cl_id = #{clId}
